short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A professional watermark remover that allows you to remove watermarks/people/objects from photos quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our watermark remover extension equips smart AI technology to erase objects from photos. After you smear over the unwanted area, the tool intelligently detects the area you select and remove the object from photographs and correct the removed area with surrounding pixels, offering a natural look. 

üç≠ Remove watermark from photo
As an AI-powered watermark remover, this tool deals well with kinds of objects. No matter what the object is, watermarks, cars, trees or any other, it erases the covered area from an image without remains. 

üéà Easy-to-use
Quick access to the watermark remover. Open the add-on on your chrome extension list and upload a photo to it. You can use the selection tool to cover unwanted items on the photo and then click "Erase" to go. 


üëÄ How to use it?
- Click the "Upload image" to import a local image file.
- Pick the rectangle selection tool to cover the unwanted area. 
- Click "Erase" and the selected object will be removed.
